Description:
Dependabot now supports security alerts and updates for uv. When vulnerabilities are detected in your uv dependencies, Dependabot can automatically open security alerts and pull requests to update to secureâ€¦

The post [Dependabot security updates now support uv](https://github.blog/changelog/2025-12-16-dependabot-security-updates-now-support-uv) appeared first on [The GitHub Blog](https://github.blog).
Author: Allison
EnhancedContent:
Dependabot now supports security alerts and updates for uv. When vulnerabilities are detected in your uv dependencies, Dependabot can automatically open security alerts and pull requests to update to secure versions.

- Engage with [the Dependabot open source community](https://github.com/dependabot/dependabot-core/issues/10478) on the topic of uv support.
- Learn more in [our Dependabot security updates documentation](https://docs.github.com/code-security/dependabot/dependabot-security-updates/about-dependabot-security-updates).
- Learn more about [uv](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/getting-started/installation/).
Title: Dependabot security updates now support uv
